Detailed Description

Nachos initialization and cleanup routines.

Function Documentation

void Cleanup (   ) 
 

Nachos is halting. De-allocate global data structures.

void CleanupOK (   ) 
 

External definition, to allow us to take a pointer to this function.

void Initialize (  int  argc,
char **  argv
) 
 

Initialize Nachos global data structures. Interpret command line arguments in order to determine flags for the initialization.

Parameters:
argc is the number of command line arguments (including the name of the command) -- ex: "nachos -d +" -> argc = 3
argv is an array of strings, one for each command line argument ex: "nachos -d +" -> argv = {"nachos", "-d", "+"}
< single step user program

Config* cfg
 

This defines *all* of the global data structures used by Nachos. These are all initialized and de-allocated by this file.
